== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&sect;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/00a7/index.htm U+000A7].
  * `&sect` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/00a7/index.htm U+000A7].
